Generation VI.X: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
Generation VI.Y: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The movement of air against the long tongue Greninja keeps wrapped around its neck allows it to sense enemies it can’t see.
Generation IX.Violet: It makes shuriken out of mucus excreted from its thighs. These shuriken can cut cleanly through steel cables.
